snippet: A federal judge on Friday sentenced a Moroccan man to 30 years in prison after he was caught by the F.B.I. in a sting operation planning to detonate a bomb at the Capitol.
abstract: Federal judge sentences Amine El Khalifi to 30 years in prison as part of a plea deal; Khalifi pleaded guilty in June to attempting to use a weapon of mass destruction after he was caught by the Federal Bureau of Investigation in a sting operation planning to detonate a bomb at the Capitol.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge on Friday sentenced a Moroccan man to 30 years in prison after he was caught by the F.B.I. in a sting operation planning to detonate a bomb at the Capitol.

headline.main: Moroccan Sentenced in Plot to Bomb Capitol
headline.print_headline: Moroccan Sentenced In Plot To Bomb Capitol
